data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Parwan.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Parwan, Afghanistan

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 737,583 lost in Parwan that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Parwan, Afghanistan.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Parwan, Afghanistan.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 737,700 citizens of the the state of Parwan.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Turk people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, help the people of Parwan, Afghanistan to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Parwan, Afghanistan that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Parwan prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Parwan
location.cities_list: Charikar, Jabal os Saraj, Ḏanḏar, Siyāhgird, Qāshqāl
location.cities_list_w_pop: Charikar (53,676), Jabal os Saraj (15,032), Ḏanḏar, Siyāhgird, Qāshqāl
